thread.title: Oh Joy! is releasing a whimsical furniture line, and you’ll be able to shop the collection at Target
thread.title_full: Oh Joy! is releasing a whimsical furniture line, and you’ll be able to shop the collection at Target

author: Bronwyn Isaac
title: Oh Joy! is releasing a whimsical furniture line, and you’ll be able to shop the collection at Target
text:
Oh Joy! is releasing a whimsical furniture line, and you’ll be able to shop the collection at Target Being surrounded by sharp lines and colorful, well-curated furniture can make a world of difference in a living situation. A few choice pieces can elevate an apartment from dull and washed out to a stylish haven, which is why we’re excited to hear that Oh Joy! is coming out with a furniture line ! Since we’re big fans of the home decor collections Oh Joy! has released with Target in the past, this is the type of news we can get behind.
Blogger Joy Cho, the founder of Oh Joy! , showed off a sneak peek at the upcoming collection during Las Vegas Market. So far, we can expect a multi-colored, polka dot couch, a wildly colorful room divider, and a matching storage chest.
So excited to give you all a peek at the new Oh Joy furniture line we debuted today at the Las Vegas Market! This is just a sampling of our collab with @theclothandco which will be available online at @target soon! #lvmkt 
A photo posted by Oh Joy + Co. (@ohjoyco) on Jan 22, 2017 at 2:35pm PST 
And if this Instastory is another clue, we might be able to expect a pink couch too! (Cute Frenchie not included.)
Oh Joy / Instastory According to her Instagram post, the furniture line, which is a collab with Cloth & Company, will also be available to purchase at Target soon. Our Co-Founders @megannewecker and @christianelemieux celebrating our amazing collab with @ohjoy. #ClothAndCompany x #Ohjoy #LVMKT #ViewOnVegas 
A photo posted by @theclothandco on Jan 22, 2017 at 2:51pm PST 
There’s already been cute Oh Joy! furniture such as this whimsical, vintage-inspired bar cart, so it was only natural for them to expand to bigger pieces. Wow @briteandbubbly, your #ohjoyfortarget collection is epic! Thanks for being a fan of our products since the first collection with Target in 2014! 
A photo posted by Oh Joy + Co. (@ohjoyco) on Sep 10, 2016 at 7:14pm PDT 
If you can’t wait until the release of furniture collection, you can always shop the current Oh Joy! line at Target, which features everything from cloud-shaped sun lamps to brightly-colored framed artwork. 
We're seeing double rainbows! ( regram @kailochic) 
A photo posted by Oh Joy + Co. (@ohjoyco) on Jan 18, 2017 at 7:05pm PST 
One thing is consistent, and that is the sunny cartoon aesthetics of their products. A fresh desk for the new year! #ohjoyfortarget 
A photo posted by Oh Joy + Co. (@ohjoyco) on Jan 11, 2017 at 7:37pm PST 
We are in full support of any company that makes golden vases in the shapes of doves , this is an artistic pursuit the world needs more of.
